title: Webster's Third New International Dictionary
description: The largest, most comprehensive American dictionary available in print! The great, unabridged dictionary includes over 476,000 entries, including an expanded and updated Addenda Section of new words and meanings. The dictionary features 140,000 etymologies detailing word origins, 200,000 verbal illustrations and quotations, and over 3,000 illustrations. Includes a complimentary one-year subscription to Merriam-Webster Unabridged.com.
author: Philip Babcock Gove
